headline: Should Wayfair’s (W) Board Addition and New Store Format Shift Its Retail Growth Trajectory?
summary: Wayfair has announced the appointment of Hal Lawton, CEO of Tractor Supply Company, to its board of directors, and revealed plans to open a new 70,000-square-foot smaller-format retail store in Columbus, Ohio, in late 2026 following its initial physical retail successes. The addition of retail leadership experience to the board and the exploration of more efficient store formats signal an evolving omnichannel approach for Wayfair. We'll explore how the addition of Hal Lawton to Wayfair's...
